attributes.action: OPPOSE ALL SUPPORT FOR THE CAR INDUSTRY EXCEPT ON ENVIRONMENT GROUNDS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should oppose all calls to support the Car industry except where there is clear environment benefits
a) To significantly reduce carbon emissions 
b) To invest in environmentally sustainable technology
c) That delivers a longer lifetime for cars purchased
d) That supports alternative sustainable fuel
e) That limits scrappage and encourages recycling
